trans-unit.source: Change ATA configuration - domain connectivity password | Microsoft ATA
trans-unit.target: Change ATA configuration - domain connectivity password | Microsoft ATA

trans-unit.source: Describes how to change the Domain Connectivity Password on the ATA Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to change the Domain Connectivity Password on the ATA Gateway.

trans-unit.source: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7
trans-unit.target: Applies to: Advanced Threat Analytics version 1.7

trans-unit.source: Change ATA configuration - domain connectivity password
trans-unit.target: Change ATA configuration - domain connectivity password

trans-unit.source: « ATA Console URL
trans-unit.target: « ATA Console URL

trans-unit.source: Change the domain connectivity password
trans-unit.target: Change the domain connectivity password

trans-unit.source: If you modify the Domain Connectivity Password, make sure that the password you enter is correct.
trans-unit.target: If you modify the Domain Connectivity Password, make sure that the password you enter is correct.

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the ATA Gateway service will stop running on the ATA Gateways.
trans-unit.target: If it is not, the ATA Gateway service will stop running on the ATA Gateways.

trans-unit.source: If you suspect that this happened, on the ATA Gateway, look at the Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Errors.log file for the following:
trans-unit.target: If you suspect that this happened, on the ATA Gateway, look at the Microsoft.Tri.Gateway-Errors.log file for the following:

trans-unit.source: To correct this, follow this procedure to update the Domain Connectivity password on the ATA Center:
trans-unit.target: To correct this, follow this procedure to update the Domain Connectivity password on the ATA Center:

trans-unit.source: Open the ATA Console on the ATA Center.
trans-unit.target: Open the ATA Console on the ATA Center.

trans-unit.source: Select the settings option on the toolbar and select **Configuration**.
trans-unit.target: Select the settings option on the toolbar and select **Configuration**.

trans-unit.source: ATA configuration settings icon
trans-unit.target: ATA configuration settings icon

trans-unit.source: Select **Directory Services**.
trans-unit.target: Select **Directory Services**.

trans-unit.source: ATAA Gateway change password image
trans-unit.target: ATAA Gateway change password image

trans-unit.source: Under **Password**, change the password.
trans-unit.target: Under **Password**, change the password.

trans-unit.source: If the ATA Center have connectivity to the domain, use the **Test Connection** button to validate the credentials
trans-unit.target: If the ATA Center have connectivity to the domain, use the **Test Connection** button to validate the credentials

trans-unit.source: Click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: After changing the password, manually check that the ATA Gateway service is running on the ATA Gateway servers.
trans-unit.target: After changing the password, manually check that the ATA Gateway service is running on the ATA Gateway servers.

trans-unit.source: « ATA Console URL
trans-unit.target: « ATA Console URL

trans-unit.target: See Also

trans-unit.target: Working with the ATA Console

trans-unit.target: Install ATA
